means: 接近，走近，靠近( approach的现在分词 )
（在性质、数量、质量、情形、时间等方面）近似

sentence.Network_en: An airliner came close to disaster while approaching Heathrow Airport.
sentence.Network_cn: 一架大型客机在飞近希思罗机场时差点儿发生空难。

sentence.Network_en: We turned to see the approaching car slow down.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们转身看见驶近的车慢慢停下。

sentence.Network_en: The business in hand was approaching some kind of climax.
sentence.Network_cn: 手头的生意似乎快到紧要关头了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: time is approaching when we must be on board ., 我们上船的时间快到了.
Quest for the Ring_在线英语听力室 ... ) predate 在日期上早于 ) approaching 接近的，靠近的 ) inherit 继承.
the approaching deadline gave impetus to the investigation ., 即将到来的最后期限推动了谈判.
World War II approaching , this time the coalition forces are not dominant , and need arrows ., 决战天下大战在即 , 此时联军兵力不占优 , 同时亟需箭枝.

list.abs: 王陆807听力单词精选_百度文库 ... title n. 标题 approach n. 方法，接近 theory n. 理论.
字典中望字的解释 ... (13) 怨恨,责怪[ grudge] (15) 接近[ approach] (2) 名望[ prestige].

entry.def: When you approach something, you get closer to it.

example.ex: He didn't approach the front door at once...
When I approached, they grew silent...
example.tran: 当我走近时，他们就不说话了。

entry.def: An approach to a place is a road, path, or other route that leads to it.

example.ex: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.

entry.def: If you approach someone about something, you speak to them about it for the first time, often making an offer or request.

example.ex: When Chappel approached me about the job, my first reaction was of disbelief...
example.tran: 当查普尔为这份工作找我商量时，我的第一反应是不相信。

example.ex: He approached me to create and design the restaurant...
example.tran: 他请我建造并设计该饭店。

entry.def: When you approach a task, problem, or situation in a particular way, you deal with it or think about it in that way.

example.ex: The Bank has approached the issue in a practical way...
example.tran: 银行已经实际解决了这个问题。

example.ex: Employers are interested in how you approach problems.
example.tran: 雇主们对你如何处理问题感兴趣。

entry.def: Your approach to a task, problem, or situation is the way you deal with it or think about it.

example.ex: We will be exploring different approaches to gathering information.
example.tran: 我们将探索收集信息的不同方法。

example.ex: ...the adversarial approach of the British legal system.
example.tran: 英国法律制度采用的辩论式审判模式

entry.def: As a future time or event approaches, it gradually gets nearer as time passes.

example.ex: As autumn approached, the plants and colours in the garden changed.
example.tran: 秋天临近，花园中的草木和颜色也发生了变化。

entry.def: As you approach a future time or event, time passes so that you get gradually nearer to it.

example.ex: We approach the end of the year with the economy slowing and little sign of cheer.
example.tran: 接近年末时，我们面临经济迟滞、处处萧条的局面。

entry.def: If something approaches a particular level or state, it almost reaches that level or state.

example.ex: Oil prices have approached their highest level for almost ten years...
example.tran: 石油价格已接近近10年中的最高水平。

example.ex: Mansell will race at average speeds approaching 200mph.
example.tran: 曼塞尔将以接近每小时200英里的平均车速参赛。

means.word_mean: 1. the event of one object coming closer to another
2. the temporal property of becoming nearer in time;
3. the act of drawing spatially closer to something;

auth_sentence.content: They need to re-evaluate how they are approaching threats.
auth_sentence.res_content: They need to re-evaluate how they are approaching threats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They need to re-evaluate how they are approaching threats.

auth_sentence.content: These recollections are not written with anything approaching elegance.
auth_sentence.res_content: These recollections are not written with anything approaching elegance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These recollections are not written with anything approaching elegance.

auth_sentence.content: The hardest days of the hunger season are approaching.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hardest days of the hunger season are approaching.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hardest days of the hunger season are approaching.

Sentence.sentence: In the meantime, the amount of CO2 in the air is rapidly approaching the limits proposed by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).

sentences.en: In the far distance I saw a ride approaching.
sentences.cn: 我看见一个人从远处骑着马过来。

sentences.en: I saw a figure approaching in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我看见黑暗中有个人影走过来。

sentences.en: Her finger tightened on the trigger as she heard footsteps approaching.
sentences.cn: 她听到脚步声越来越近，便手指紧扣扳机。

sentences.en: The approaching tornado struck awe in our hearts.
sentences.cn: 正在逼近的龙卷风使我们惊恐万分。

sentences.en: The cars had stopped at the sound of the approaching siren.
sentences.cn: 这些汽车听到愈来愈近的警笛声便停了下来。
